term.title: pneumatic detector

item.text: A pressure-sensitive detector based on the pressure increase of a gas. A special type is the Golay cell where the pressure change is detected by observing the deflection off one of the chamber walls.

sources.item: PAC, 1995, 67, 1745. 'Nomenclature, symbols, units and their usage in spectrochemical analysis-XI. Detection of radiation (IUPAC Recommendations 1995)' on page 1752 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199567101745)
